Package DataStructureHW5_Q4

Class MaxHeap<E extends AgeDataInterface<E>>

java.lang.Object
DataStructureHW5_Q4.MaxHeap<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of data which extends from AgeDataInterface.
public class MaxHeap<E extends AgeDataInterface<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
Max Heap implementation (Where the maximum element is in the root node.

  • Constructor Summary

    MaxHeap()

  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add​(E item)
      add a new record. It will first check if an AgeData object with that age exists in any index of the ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the item has been added, otherwise returns false.

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(E item)
      first check if a node with that age exists. If it exists and If the number of people field is 1, it will remove the node, If the number of people filed is greater than 1, it will decrease the number of people field.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the item has been removed, otherwise returns false.

    • find

      public E find​(E toFind)
      gets an AgeData object of any age and find the AgeData object with the same age and return it.
      Parameters:
      toFind - the item to be found.
      Returns:
      AgeData which is found or null.

    • youngerThan

      public int youngerThan​(int anAge)
      returns the number of people younger than an age.
      Parameters:
      anAge - an age to compare.
      Returns:
      the number of people younger than an age.
